name: Jesus of suburbia
author: Elijah
notes: 75 wins, a brand new record not gonna lie, i tilted so badly with the bricks and playing agaist hazy flame w/ beatdown (hopefully they get banned soon) and exodia tilt with temple and ladybug *edit: REZ is this deck's biggest counter atm, i added WoD just for that particular matchup instead of regulation of tribe (i'll explain later why)
